title: Igor Tudor is no longer Juventus' head coach - Juventus
snippet: Juventus Football Club announces that it has today relieved Igor Tudor of his duties as head coach of the Men's First Team, along with his staff consisting of Ivan Javorcic, Tomislav Rogic and Riccardo Ragnacci.

title: Igor Tudor - Wikipedia
snippet: On 23 March 2025, Tudor replaced Thiago Motta as head coach of Serie A club Juventus. This appointment marked the first time Juventus had appointed a foreign manager since Didier Deschamps in the 2006–07 season. He eventually guided the club to the fourth place of league table and Champions ...

title: Igor Tudor to remain as Juventus head coach for 2025-26 season - The Athletic
snippet: Juventus have confirmed that head coach Igor Tudor will stay with the club for the 2025-26 season.

title: Back in Bianconero | All you need to know about new Juventus coach Igor Tudor - Juventus
snippet: Igor Tudor’s Juventus history is set to have a new chapter written. A solid defender at first, and then a coach later, Igor is back with the Bianconeri to lead the men’s first team.

title: r/soccer on Reddit: Igor Tudor is no longer Juventus' head coach
snippet: "Juventus FC announces that it has today relieved Igor Tudor of his duties as head coach of the Men's First Team, along with his staff consisting of Ivan Javorcic, Tomislav Rogic and Riccardo Ragnacci.
